item.title: Nate add a quote by Barry Goldwater
item.description: "A government big enough to give you everything you want is big enough to take everything you have." -- Barry Goldwater

item.title: Nate add a quote by Clarence Thomas
item.description: "Merely because I was black, it seemed, I was supposed to listen to Hugh Maskela instead of Carole King, just as I was expected to be a radical, not a conservative. I no longer cared to play that game ... The black people I knew came from different places and backgrounds - social, economic, even ethnic - yet the color of our skin was somehow supposed to make us identical in spite of our differences. I didn't buy it. Of course we had all experienced racism in one way or another, but that did not mean we had to think alike" -- Clarence Thomas
